reviewText: a couple is making obviously simulated lovemaking at the start of the movie. this goes on for about fifteen minutes but seems like forever. starts poorly and goes downhill from there. long long boring lovemaking sessions between long long boring pointless conversations. avoid at all cost.
...ok I'm lying. What I should say is I liked the sex scenes in this film alot, they were nice and long and the main actress is a winner. This film is a keeper in my collection.
